import React from "react"; import { Modal, Button, Form, } from "react-bootstrap"; import numberWithCommas from "../utils/utils"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faMinus, faPlus, faTrash } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; const ModalKeranjang = (props) => { const { handleClose, showModal, keranjangDetail, keterangan, tambah, kurang, jumlah, changeHandler, handleSubmit, totalHarga, hapusPesanan } = props if (keranjangDetail) { return ( {keranjangDetail.product.nama} {""} ({numberWithCommas(keranjangDetail.product.harga)})

Total Harga

{numberWithCommas(totalHarga)} Jumlah Pesan
{jumlah} Keterangan : {changeHandler(event)}}/>
); } else { return false } }; export default ModalKeranjang;
